mapper.select: SELECT i.itemNum, i.ctNum, itemName, i.itemPrice, i.itemPrice * (100-NVL(discount,0)) * 0.01 finalPrice, discount, NVL(COUNT(o.itemNum),0) numCount, mainImage FROM item i JOIN ( SELECT ctNum FROM category WHERE CONNECT_BY_ROOT ctNum = #{num} START WITH parentCT IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR ctNum = parentCT ) c ON c.ctNum = i.ctNum LEFT JOIN orderDetail o ON o.itemNum = i.itemNum WHERE showNotice = 0 GROUP BY i.itemNum, i.ctNum, itemName, i.itemPrice, i.itemPrice * (100-NVL(discount,0)) * 0.01, discount, mainImage ORDER BY numCount DESC, i.itemNum DESC FETCH FIRST 4 ROWS ONLY

SELECT i.itemNum, i.ctNum, itemName, i.itemPrice, i.itemPrice * (100-NVL(discount,0)) * 0.01 finalPrice, discount, mainImage FROM item i JOIN ( SELECT ctNum FROM category WHERE CONNECT_BY_ROOT ctNum = #{num} START WITH parentCT IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR ctNum = parentCT ) c ON c.ctNum = i.ctNum WHERE showNotice = 0 AND discount > 0 ORDER BY discount DESC, itemNum DESC FETCH FIRST 8 ROWS ONLY

SELECT i.itemNum, i.ctNum, itemName, i.itemPrice, i.itemPrice * (100-NVL(discount,0)) * 0.01 finalPrice, discount, mainImage FROM item i JOIN ( SELECT ctNum FROM category WHERE CONNECT_BY_ROOT ctNum = #{num} START WITH parentCT IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR ctNum = parentCT ) c ON c.ctNum = i.ctNum WHERE showNotice = 0 ORDER BY regDate DESC, itemNum DESC FETCH FIRST 8 ROWS ONLY
